thread.title: BRIEF-Lockheed Martin To Deliver 17 Mwh Of Gridstar™ Lithium Energy Storage Systems To Peak Power Inc.

title: BRIEF-Lockheed Martin To Deliver 17 Mwh Of Gridstar™ Lithium Energy Storage Systems To Peak Power Inc.

organizations.name: lithium energy storage systems to peak power inc

text:
April 19, 2018 / 3:07 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Lockheed Martin To Deliver 17 Mwh Of Gridstar™ Lithium Energy Storage Systems To Peak Power Inc. Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 19 (Reuters) - Lockheed Martin Corp: 
* LOCKHEED MARTIN TO DELIVER 17 MWH OF GRIDSTAR™ LITHIUM ENERGY STORAGE SYSTEMS TO PEAK POWER INC. 
* LOCKHEED MARTIN - THE UNITS WILL BE INSTALLED IN ONTARIO, CANADA, AND ALONG EAST COAST OF UNITED STATES 
* LOCKHEED MARTIN - SIGNED AGREEMENT TO SUPPLY ABOUT 17 MWH OF GRIDSTA LITHIUM ENERGY STORAGE SYSTEMS TO PEAK POWER INC Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
